channel.title: Blast Pit - Stuck in elevator
channel.description:
So, I got myself stuck in the elevator in Blast Pit. I got in the elevator that's supposed to grind to a halt then fall soon after into a pool of toxic waste.
As the elevator was descending, I got a little impatient and tried to jump out the window before the elevator stopped. I got caught between a support beam and the elevator and cannot move; I can turn around in place, though. The elevator descending sound loops over and over again.
getpos setpos 2286.046875 2122.357422 495.675140;setang 72.236023 -171.531952 -2.196900
